u.a: Getting ready to start the recording. Bartosz gets interested in the tape-recorder. He reaches for it. Jolanta tries to get Bartosz interested in something else than the tape-recorder .
Bartosz is pointing to the door beyond which the father disappeared .
in the other corner of the room the mother is talking to Zofia .
mother has just pointed to the picture on the wall .
Bartosz is looking at the door again .
the mother is trying to guess what Bartosz meant .
Bartosz comes up to his wheelbarrow-toy .
Bartosz starts playing with the wheelbarrow .
Bartosz drives his wheebarrow round the room .
"tutu" is a baby word for "a drink".
the mother says she hasńt prepared anything for Bartosz . she went to the kitchen to prepare some drink . Jolanta is talking to Bartosz .
Jolanta is giving Bartosz some of her tea .
the tea is too strong for Bartosz .
come I will give you some .
Jolanta is trying to elicit a polite request for tea from Bartosz .
Bartosz has finally been given the tea .
Bartosz is drinking his tea . the mother enters the room .
you will hit me now wońt you ?
mother takes the glass from Bartosz .
mother is giving Bartosz the tea she prepared for him .
that is the lady's tea and this is yours .
Bartosz has drunk some of his tea .
Bartosz brings some of his toys .
Bartosz is going to his room .

what are you going to bring ?

it is not rolling any more .

Bartosz picks up the drum from the floor . he chops it again .
Bartosz is running round the room .

and what do you want to do with this water Bartosz ?
what are you going to do with it ?

Bartosz and why are you so excited today ?
Bartosz runs to the other room and hides away behind the door .
a watering+can is beside the flower .

I'm not going to look for him !

mommy I want a piece of chocolate .
Bartosz comes back from the kitchen with the chocolate .
Bartosz leaves immediately after having said this utterance . Jolanta is speaking to Zofia .
Bartosz goes to the corner with his toys . he plays with a car rolling it towards Jolanta . Jolanta stops the car .
Bartosz rolled the car on my knee .
Bartosz continues playing with his car . mother is sitting on the sofa .
have you had your nap yet ?

what are you doing with the little book ?

bef Bartosz got impatient . he urged Jolanta .

there are several cars in the picture .

has he seen a true mushroom yet ?
mother shows Bartosz a picture of a boy washing a car .
and what is a little boy doing here ?

another picture is shown to Bartosz .
and what is it here look in this little picture ?
mother's finger still points to the sun .

Bartosz shows mother a picture of Pinocchio .

look what a nose Pinocchio has got .

what is it here in the picture ?
what is it here in the picture ?
Bartosz rushes to the door and shouts .
you will show what (there is) in the picture .
Bartosz is shown a picture of a boy .
come I'll show you what is in the picture .
mother shows Bartosz a picture where a boy is painting .
what is he doing with the iron ?
a few minutes ago we saw a picture of a boy washing a car .
because he doesńt know and looks for a way out .
we keep sitting on the sofa .
mother shows a picture of a mother pushing a baby carriage
and mother will ask you here .
and what is there in the baby carriage ?
a mother is pushing a pram and what is there in the pram ?
Bartosz leaves us on the sofa and goes to his toy room in the corner . he fumbles amongst the toys . he picks up one .

Bartosz gives me the ball . he is not listening to his mother .

there are pieces to be put inside the ball .
it cańt be opened any further .

and what are you going to do with the pen ?
are you going to write here ?

you've got your own pen and your color+n|pencils .

mother puts Bartosz on the window+sill . Bartosz looks down on the street .

down on the street Marta's parents are unloading their car .
a car passed by in the background .
and who is going there far far away ?

look now Bartosz what is the car doing ?
another car passed by the neighbor's car .

but did any car really pass by ?
it passed by and he noticed .
Bartosz is still looking through the window .
mother comments on Marta's ill and dressed eye .
she is being treated isńt she ?
she has a cast in the eye .
Marta is going to go home . she waves to Bartosz and shouts something .
they are shouting to each other .
Marta disappeared in the house . Bartosźs father left about 15 minutes ago . he went by car .
Bartosz is looking down the street .
there are several cars in the street .
daddy is gone and what then ?
down in the street a car like theirs passed by . Bartosz is supposed to know the trade mark .
such a noisy car thus daddy .
you have a Trabant dońt you ?
mother takes Bartosz off the window+sill .
well talk to us a bit now .
mother is pointing to the picture on the wall .
and what is there in the picture .
one cannot see from here right Bartosz ?
in Polish the expression means "to take a look".
the holy family is in the picture . Bartosz is looking at it .
Bartosz holds out his hands . he wants the mother to take him up .
Bartosz looks at the picture closely for a while . then he is placed on the floor again .
we are close to the place where a few minutes ago Bartosz left his peg top .
set the peg top in motion ?
I'll set it in motion for you .

well I was to set it (in motion) .
mother is explaining about the top peg being a bit out of order .
he put some Salty Fingers inside .
we thought it was broken down but he had put the Fingers inside there .
what is there in the peg top ?

what have you done with your shoe ?
and haveńt you got your shoe ?
and what do you want to do with it ?

what will you do with the shoe ?
son, what to do with the shoe ?
what to do with the shoe ?

finally Bartosz releases the peg top .

what shall we do with the shoe ?
what shall we do with the shoe ?
well look where do you have your shoe ?
mother holds the shoe in her hand .

what is the peg top doing ?

what is the peg top doing ?

because you haveńt got the shoe .

the shoe is already on . Bartosz reaches for the peg_top .
mother and Zofia are commenting on Bartosźs activities .

Bartosz uses the expression "pali się" to describe something being on, eg the light, the tape recorder, the radio . in the above utterance he may have meant that the peg top is not set in motion .
we are trying to attract Bartosźs attention to other things .
and take your teddy bear and the duck and put the duck on the wheelbarrow .

and where is that tiny little ball son ?

dońt do your kulululu@c like this Bartosz !

I can see you are working hard on that ball .

mother pretends not being able to mend the ball-shaped box . Bartosz gets very much amused . he is smiling and laughing .
mother finished with the ball and went towards the table .

we will put this roll aside now .
mother takes the roll from Bartosz and puts it on the table .
come on, you have already eaten (you are full) .
the roll will wait here and then Bartosz will come to the roll again .
mother wants Bartosz to be more talkative . she holds him tight and talks into his ear .

take a duck and bring it .
it's a pity we didńt record him during the meal .

having brought the duck Bartosz is no longer interested in it .

invite the lady to a dance .

and what shall we sing Bartosz ?

the ring got broken and we all bang !

but what is mommy to do ?
what am I to do now ?

what shall we do with this ?
what do we do with this ?
nobody is on the floor any more . everybody stood up .

but what shall we do with this ?
what shall we put in here ?

what will we put in there ?
but what will we take and what will we be doing ?
mother takes the can and goes to the bathroom to fill it with water .
mother pours water into the can .

mommy is pouring (some) water (into the can) .

mother is going to give Bartosz the watering+can full of water .
he doesńt love his mother and father as much as he loves water .

but hold it so that you wońt spill it .
father knocks at the door . Everybody has gathered in the hall in front of the door .
and what shall we do now ?

father is still waiting . mother doesńt want to open before Bartosz answers her questions .
father opened the door himself and entered .
I am changing my sex right now .

where are you going to Bartosz ?

father has finished talking to Zofia . he finally looks at Bartosz .
Bartosz shows his falling down again .
father shows Bartosz another way to "ride" the pillow .
mother calls on Bartosz from the kitchen .

dońt you want it this way ?

father has said that Bartosz likes to water flowers .

dońt you like it any more ?
well, just tell me what it is for ?

now he will have to water the flower .

well what are we doing son ?

tell us what you have done .

and what else have you done ?

what have you done to the flowers ?
what have you done to the flowers ?
what have you done to the flowers ?
Bartosz goes to the other room . we stay for a while where we are .
I'm not going to say and that's all .

and has he said today what his name is ?

Bartosz wants to quit . father still holds his hand .

father releases him not having received an answer to his question .

I'm not going to watch you .

you dońt want it (and do you want) ?
well what is the ball doing ?
bam@c is what you are doing all the time .

Bartosz throws the ball towards Jolanta .
Bartosz goes to father who is smoking a cigarette in the other room . he wants his father to give him the lighter .
the child has just said give me the lighter .

father is switching the lighter on several times . Bartosz gets very excited .
father switches the lighter on again .
dońt you like auntie at all ?
you dońt want to tell her what you have done ?

father hides himself behind the door . Bartosz hasńt noticed that .

look what we have got here ?
have you shown it to her yet ?

the lighter is in the father's hand .

so give it to me Bartosz .
